entry.title: EveryPet Formula. Natural pet health supplement
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Herbal Pet
Type: Pet Health Supplements
Price: 135.00

The Herbal Pet EveryPet Formula is a blend of herbs, vitamins, probiotics and omega oils as a natural pet health supplement to supplement your pet’s diet and promote tip top health in dogs and cats. (200 g)

  • Contains all the essential vitamins and minerals that your pet requires for excellent health and vitality. 
  • Also helps to manage joint health and good digestion. 
  • Will maintain a healthy, glossy coat and strong bones. 
  • Contains powerful ingredients like Spirulina, Magnesium, Chia Seeds, Diatomaceous Earth, MSM & Seaweed Meal to name a few.
  • Simply sprinkle on food - very easy to administer.
  • Suitable for dogs and cats
  • Made in South Africa to reduce YOUR carbon footprint!

Ingredients

Vitamin A, Spirulina, Magnesium, Taurine, Chia Seed, Diatomaceous Earth, Vitamin D3, MSM, Fructo-oligosaccharides, Zinc, Iron, Copper, Vitamin B2, Vitamin B1, Vitamin B6, Vitamin B12, Seaweed Meal, Brewer's Yeast

Directions

Simply mix with wet food:

Daily amount:

Small pets [ <10kg ]: 1/2 tsp

Average pets [ 10-20kg ]: 1 level tsp

Large pets [ 20-40kg ]: 1 heaped tsp (5g)

Giant breeds [ >40kg ]: 2 heaped tsps (10g)

    A 200g tub will last one large dog 40 days.

    Caution:

    • Not recommended for pets with ulcers or gallstones.
    • Not recommended for pregnant bitches.
    • Do not use if your pet has ulcers or gallstones
    • Don’t use together with blood thinning medication or nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drugs (NSAIDs)
    • Discontinue immediately at any sign of adverse reaction

    Disclaimer: This medicine has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness. Please consult your veterinarian if symptoms persist.

entry.title: Dried Turmeric Powder - Natural Supplement for Pets
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Herbal Pet
Type: Pet Health Supplements
Price: 46.50

The Herbal Pet's 100% Dried Turmeric Root Powder (200g) is a wonderful supplement for cats, dogs and horses!

  • Turmeric has long been used in both the Chinese and Indian systems of medicine, due to its  powerful medicinal value
  • Acts as a digestive aid, reduces the growth of cancerous cells, reduces arthritis symptoms, prevents Alzheimer's, treats Asthma and is as a powerful antioxidant
  • A 200g tub will last one average dog 2 months and one horse at least 20 days
  • Made in South Africa to reduce YOUR carbon footprint!

Ingredients

100% dried Turmeric Root powder

Directions for use

Daily amount:

  • Dogs and cats: One quarter to 2 teaspoons per day, added to the same amount of oil (eg. cold pressed olive, linseed or coconut oil) and 3 twists of black pepper.  Mix well into the pet’s food.
  • Horses: One to two tablespoons per day, added to the same amount of oil (eg. cold pressed olive, linseed or coconut oil) and 7 to 14  twists of black pepper.  Mix well into the concentrated feed of the horse.

Note: This is a nutritional product and is not intended as a substitute for veterinary products or advice.

entry.title: Joint Formula for Healthy Joints
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Herbal Pet
Type: Pet Health Supplements
Price: 158.00

The Herbal Pet Joint Formula is a natural chemical-free joint supplement for dogs and helps to maintain healthy joints in all dogs, including active dogs, elderly dogs and those with stiff, painful joints. Contains Devil's Claw and Glucosamine Sulphate. (200 g)

  • A blend of herbs and nutrients formulated to nutritionally support active, stiff, old or arthritic pets. 
  • Helps to reduce inflammation, pain and stiffness
  • Regular use improves the health of joints and cartilage
  • Non-toxic with no unwanted side effects
  • Locally made to reduce your carbon footprint

Ingredients

Devil's Claw, MSM, Glucosamine, Evening Primrose, Fenugreek, and Seaweed meal

Directions

Simply mix with wet food:

  • Small pets [ <10kg ]: 1/2 tsp
  • Average pets [ 10-20kg ]: 1 level tsp
  • Large pets [ 20-40kg ]: 1 heaped tsp (5g)
  • Giant breeds [ >40kg ]: 2 heaped tsps (10g)

A 200g tub will last one large dog 40 days.

Caution:

  • Not recommended for pets with ulcers or gallstones.
  • Not recommended for pregnant bitches.
  • Do not use if your pet has ulcers or gallstones
  • Don’t use together with blood thinning medication or nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drugs (NSAIDs)
  • Discontinue immediately at any sign of adverse reaction

Disclaimer: This medicine has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness. Please consult your veterinarian if symptoms persist.

entry.title: Dried Devil's Claw Powder - Natural Supplement for Pets
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Herbal Pet
Type: Pet Health Supplements
Price: 80.00

The Herbal Pet's 100% dried Devil's Claw Powder (200g) is the perfect supplement for pets who suffer from arthritis or gout.

  • Devil's Claw prevents uric acid build up to reduce pain and inflammation
  • Widely used to soothe gout and arthritis, in both people and animals
  • An excellent daily supplement for anyone who suffers with pain caused by uric acid build up
  • Also used for other pain conditions, as well as for digestive upsets
  • Made in South Africa to reduce YOUR carbon footprint!

Ingredients

100% dried Devil's Claw powder

Directions for use

Daily amount:

  • Small to average pets [ 5-20kg ]: 1/10th tsp
  • Large pets [ 20-40kg ]: 1/5th  tsp (0.5g)
  • Giant breeds [ >40kg ]: 1/3rd tsp
  • Ponies: 1 level tsp (2.5g)
  • Horses: 1 heaped tsps (4g)

Mix into the feed. A 200g tub will last one large dog one year and one horse 50 days.

entry.title: Serenity Formula: Natural help for stressed or anxious pets
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Herbal Pet
Type: Pet Health Supplements
Price: 158.00

The Herbal Pet Serenity Formula is a natural pet supplement with Tryptophan and Inositol, as well as a blend of herbs, vitamins and minerals formulated to gently calm your pet in stressful situations, without causing drowsiness.(200 g)

  • Perfect for nervous pets with highly strung dispositions, as well as rescue pets needing some grounding 
  • Regular use helps to keep pets naturally calm and balanced 
  • Helps to calm pets during stressful situations such as vet visits, fireworks, thunderstorms, moving house, etc
  • Simply sprinkle on food - very easy to administer.
  • Suitable for dogs and cats
  • Made in South Africa to reduce YOUR carbon footprint!

Ingredients

Brewer's Yeast, L-Tryptophan, Inositol, Chamomile, Passion Flower, Magnesium

Directions

Simply mix with wet food: The following doses apply:

Daily amount:

Small pets [ <10kg ]: 1/2 tsp

Average pets [ 10-20kg ]: 1 level tsp

Large pets [ 20-40kg ]: 1 heaped tsp (5g)

Giant breeds [ >40kg ]: 2 heaped tsps (10g)

    A 200g tub will last one large dog 40 days.

    Please note:

    Not for use during pregnancy or lactation. Do not use in conjunction with anti-depressant medication. Do not exceed the recommended dose as some ingredients may be harmful in large quantities.

      Disclaimer: This medicine has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness. Please consult your veterinarian if symptoms persist.

entry.title: Allergy (or Itch) Formula: Natural help for itchy pets (200g)
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Herbal Pet
Type: Pet Health Supplements
Price: 136.50

The Herbal Pet Allergy Formula (200g) is a blend of herbs containing Sutherlandia, vitamins and minerals formulated to nutritionally maintain a healthy skin and coat. Regular use will provide relief for pets with itchy skin allergies. (200 g)

  • Contains all the essential vitamins and minerals that your pet requires for a healthy skin and coat. 
  • Regular use helps to prevent common skin problems in pets 
  • An excellent supplement for show pets whose coats need to look in tip top condition at all times
  • Simply sprinkle on food - very easy to administer.
  • Suitable for dogs and cats
  • Made in South Africa to reduce YOUR carbon footprint!

Ingredients

Citrus aurantium, Garlic, Echinacea, Siberian Ginseng, Sutherlandia, Vitamin C, Iron, Seaweed meal

Directions

Simply mix with wet food: Feed double or triple the recommended dose for the first week. Thereafter, the following doses apply:

Daily amount:

Small pets [ <10kg ]: 1/2 tsp

Average pets [ 10-20kg ]: 1 level tsp

Large pets [ 20-40kg ]: 1 heaped tsp (5g)

Giant breeds [ >40kg ]: 2 heaped tsps (10g)

    A 200g tub will last one large dog 40 days.

    Please note:

    Not for use during pregnancy or lactation, or in pets with an auto-immune condition.

      Disclaimer: This medicine has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness. Please consult your veterinarian if symptoms persist.

entry.title: Rooibos - Natural Pet Health Supplement
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Herbal Pet
Type: Pet Health Supplements
Price: 25.00

Herbal Pet's Rooibos Supplement (200g) is a great daily supplement to keep pets healthy, infection-free and happy!
  • Rooibos contains a wide range of flavonoids which help support the body’s defenses as potent antioxidants
  • Boosts immune system and helps your pet fight infections naturally
  • Ingesting rooibos helps improve digestive health, allergies, heart health and kidneys
  • Made in South Africa to reduce YOUR carbon footprint!

Ingredients

Crude Fibre (0.3%), Crude Ash (<0.2%), Moisture Content (<10%), Oxygen Radical Antioxidant Capacity (ORAC): (>1000 umol/g)

Directions for use

Daily amount:
Small pets [ <10kg ]: 1 level tsp (1.5g)
Average pets [ 10-20kg ]: 1 heaped tsp (3g)
Large pets [ 20-40kg ]: 1.5 heaped tsp (4.5g)
Giant breeds [ >40kg ]: 2 heaped tsps (6g)
Ponies: 1 to 2 small handfuls per day
Horses: 1 to 3 small handfuls per day
Mix into the feed or add to water to make a tea. A 200g pack will last one large dog 1 month and one horse 1 week.

Note: This is a nutritional product and is not intended as a substitute for veterinary products or advice.

entry.title: Dried Kelp Powder - Nutritional Supplement for Pets
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Herbal Pet
Type: Pet Health Supplements
Price: 37.00

The Herbal Pet's 100% Dried Kelp Powder (200g) contains the whole range of amino acids and vitamins, as well as minerals!

  • Ecklonia maxima is a species of Kelp (Seaweed) found off the West coast of southern Africa
  • Kelp is widely used and accepted as a valuable and inexpensive feed supplement for all livestock including horses and dogs
  • Anti-inflammatory, demulcent, emollient, protective against radiation, anti-cancer, anti-tumour, antibiotic, immuno-stimulant, anti-viral and soothing to intestinal mucosa
  • Aids cancer, heart disease, mange, old age, stool eating and thyroid gland regulation
  • Made in South Africa to reduce YOUR carbon footprint!

Ingredients

100% dried Kelp powder

Directions for use

Daily amount:
Small pets [ <10kg ]: a small pinch
Average pets [ 10-20kg ]: 1/4 tsp
Large pets [ 20-40kg ]: 1/3 tsp
Giant breeds: 1/2 tsp (1g)
Ponies: 1 level tsp
Horses: 1 heaped tsp (5g)
Mix into the feed. A 200g pack will last one giant breed dog 200 days and one horse 40 days!

Note: This is a nutritional product and is not intended as a substitute for veterinary products or advice.

entry.title: Deworming & Parasite Cleansing Supplement for Pets | The Herbal Pet
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Herbal Pet
Type: Pet Health Supplements
Price: 150.50

The Herbal Pet Cleansing Formula is a natural pet supplement with Diatomaceous Earth, Wormwood, pumpkin seeds and a blend of herbs formulated for parasite control, detox and digestive health in dogs and cats (240 g)

  • Use for regular natural parasite control, including de-worming
  • Excellent for detox, digestive balance and systemic cleansing
  • Recommended for horses, dogs and cats, as well as rescue pets with high fecal egg counts
  • Simply sprinkle on food - very easy to administer.
  • Suitable for dogs, cats and horses
  • Made in South Africa to reduce YOUR carbon footprint!

Ingredients

Diatomaceous Earth, Pumpkin Seed, Dandelion, Wormwood, Cloves, Seaweed meal

Directions

Simply mix with wet food: The following doses apply:

Daily amount:

  • Small pets [ <10kg ]: 1/2 tsp (2.5g) per day* See cycle below
  • Medium pets [ 10-20kg ]: 1 heaped tsp (5g) per day*
  • Large pets [ 20-40kg ]: 1 1/2 tsp (7.5g) per day*
  • Giant breeds [ >40kg ]: 2 heaped tsps (10g) per day*
  • Ponies: 8 heaped tsps (40g) per day*
  • Horses: 10 – 12 heaped tsps (50g – 60g) per day*

*Feeding cycle –  Feed for 4 days, skip for 17 and repeat cycle. Thereafter repeat this schedule every 6 months or when needed. A 240g tub will cleanse 10 medium pets or 1 horse.

Please note:

Not for use during pregnancy or lactation, or in pets with liver, gallbladder or kidney disease.

    Disclaimer: This medicine has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness. Please consult your veterinarian if symptoms persist.
